info.author: Martronic SA
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Solgema.blinks Package Readme
        =========================
        
        Overview
        ========
        
        Solgema.blinks -0.1 First Release
        
        This product implements the www.b-links.fr backlinks service in Plone.

        You must have a www.b-links.fr account to use this service!

        www.b-links.fr service provides backlinks you can share with other www.b-links.fr members.
        Your urls will be displyed on the other member's websites and, with Solgema.blinks, the urls
        of other member's websites will be displayed on specified pages of your website.
        The aim is to improve google page rank. 

        Installation
        ============

        You must have a www.b-links.fr account to use this service!

        After installation, there is a new portlet type named Solgema b-links.
        The best is to add it in the root of your portal.

        When adding the portlet you must fill 3 fields.
        First is the title of your portlet. When leaved blank, no title will be displayed.
        The second one is the key given to you by the www.b-links.fr service.
        The third one is the urls you entrered in your account on www.b-links.fr. One url per line.

        The portlet will be displayed if the current page is one of the pages you specified in
        the portlet urls and if it recieves something from www.b-links.fr
        
        Change History
        ==============
        
        0.1 (2010-08-09)
        ------------------
        
        - First Public release
info.name: Solgema.blinks
info.summary: Solgema.blinks implements the www.b-links.fr functionality into Plone through a new portlet type.
info.html_description:
Solgema.blinks Package Readme
=========================

Overview
========

Solgema.blinks -0.1 First Release

This product implements the www.b-links.fr backlinks service in Plone.

You must have a www.b-links.fr account to use this service!

www.b-links.fr service provides backlinks you can share with other www.b-links.fr members.
Your urls will be displyed on the other member's websites and, with Solgema.blinks, the urls
of other member's websites will be displayed on specified pages of your website.
The aim is to improve google page rank.

Installation
============

You must have a www.b-links.fr account to use this service!

After installation, there is a new portlet type named Solgema b-links.
The best is to add it in the root of your portal.

When adding the portlet you must fill 3 fields.
First is the title of your portlet. When leaved blank, no title will be displayed.
The second one is the key given to you by the www.b-links.fr service.
The third one is the urls you entrered in your account on www.b-links.fr. One url per line.

The portlet will be displayed if the current page is one of the pages you specified in
the portlet urls and if it recieves something from www.b-links.fr

Change History
==============

0.1 (2010-08-09)
------------------

- First Public release
